snippet: The Granite State has far fewer evangelical Christians than Iowa, which may limit Rick Santorum's appeal.
abstract: The Granite State has far fewer evangelical Christians than Iowa, which may limit Rick Santorum's appeal.
lead_paragraph: While Rick Santorum received strong support from evangelical Christians and voters who described themselves as very conservative in the Iowa caucuses, he most likely won't be able to count on that deep of a base in New Hampshire.

headline.main: Eyeing Santorum's Possible Base in New Hampshire
